Description: Use Sanitation wipes to clean all Kiosk surfaces
Instructions:
1. Get cleaning wipes
2. Wipe down screen
3. Dispose of used wipes
Name: Wipe Down Kiosk

Description: Roll up the rugs and shake them out back
Instructions:
1. Roll up rug
2. Sweep underneath
3. Roll out after mopping is complete
Name: Remove and Shake the Rugs

Description: Wipe down door handles & light switches
Instructions:
1. Get cleaning wipes
2. Wipe down contact points
3. Dispose of used wipes
Name: Wipe Down Contact Points

Description: Use disinfecting wipes
Instructions:
1. Get cleaning wipes
2. Wipe down contact points
3. Dispose of used wipes
Name: Wipe Down Railing

Description: Use disinfecting wipes
Instructions:
1. Get cleaning wipes
2. Wipe down screen
3. Dispose of used wipes
Name: Wipe Down Kiosk

Description: Stock the cleaning closet
Instructions:
1. Fill cart with new supplies
2. Stock the cleaning closet
Name: Stock Cleaning Equipment

Description: Sanitize Used Cart Handles
Instructions:
1. Get disinfectant wipes
2. Grab used shopping carts
3. Wipe down points of contact
Name: Sanitize Carts

Description: Sanitize Used Basket Handles
Instructions:
1. Get disinfectant wipes
2. Grab used baskets
3. Wipe down points of contact
Name: Sanitize Baskets

Description: Remove build up of dirt & dust
Instructions:
1. Fill mop bucket with hot water & add soap
2. Lay out wet floor sign
3. Mop floor
4. Return mop & bucket
Name: Mop Floors

Description: Remove Trash & replace Bag
Instructions:
1. Grab 2 new bags
2. Remove current trash bag
3. Tie bag
4. Insert new bags, double bag
Name: Take Out The Trash

Description: Take out trash & replace bag
Instructions:
1. Grab 2 new bags
2. Remove current trash bag
3. Tie bag
4. Insert new bags, double bag
Name: Take Out The Trash

Instructions:
1. Grab 2 new bags
2. Remove current trash bag
3. Tie bag
4. Insert new bags, double bag
Name: Take Out The Trash

Description: Mop under rugs, Remove build up of dirt & dusk
Instructions:
*After rugs are removed, mop the front entrance starting with the front of the doors all the way back
1. Fill mop bucket with hot water & add soap
2. Lay out wet floor sign
3. Mop floor
4. Return mop & bucket
Name: Mop Floors

Description: Fill hand sanitizer bottle to full capacity
Instructions:
1. Get Sanitizer from Storage Closet
2. Unlock & Open Hand Sanitizer
3. Fill Hand Sanitizer to top
4. Close & Lock Hand Sanitizer
5. Return Sanitizer
Name: Fill hand sanitizer

Description: Wipe down surfaces frequently touched by customers
Instructions:
1. Grab app purpose cleaner & rag
2. Spray surface with cleaner
3. Wipe down with rag
4. Check for wet spots
Name: Disinfect Surfaces

Description: Clean & Sanitize Toilets
Instructions:
1. Get cleaner, paper towels & brush
2. Spray all surfaces of toilet
3. Wipe down with paper towels
4. Scrub bowl
5. Flush
Name: Clean Toilets

Description: Clean & Sanitize Toilets
Instructions:

3. Wipe down with paper towels
4. Scrub bowl

Description: Clean & Sanitize Sinks
Instructions:
1. Spray sinks with cleaner
2. Wipe down with paper towels
3. Wipe under sinks
4. Spray mirrors with glass cleaner
5. Wipe dry with paper towels
Name: Clean Sinks
